title: A Strange Arrival
summary: An awkward Omega duckling is born among Alpha and Beta siblings, immediately standing out due to its unusual appearance and scent.

title: Outcast in the Nest
summary: The Omega duckling faces rejection from its family and peers, enduring taunts and exclusion because of its differences.

title: Seeking Shelter
summary: Fleeing the nest, the Omega duckling wanders alone, seeking acceptance and safety among strangers in the harsh outside world.

title: Encounters with Others
summary: The duckling meets various Alpha and Beta animals who either shun or pity it, deepening its loneliness and confusion.

title: A Winter Alone
summary: The duckling survives a cold, isolating winter, growing stronger and discovering unexpected resilience within itself.

title: Transformation
summary: As spring arrives, the Omega duckling undergoes a remarkable transformation, revealing its true nature as a majestic Omega swan.

title: Accepted at Last
summary: The swan is welcomed by a flock of fellow Omegas, who embrace its uniqueness, finally giving the duckling the sense of belonging it always craved.

title: A New Beginning
summary: With newfound confidence and acceptance, the former ugly duckling embarks on a joyful life among friends, celebrating its Omega identity.
